messaging_body:
Hello [FIRST_NAME]!

We are so excited that you've decided to join us in promoting [FILM_NAME]!

Here if your affiliate link:
[AFFILIATE_LINK]

Remember that you will make $[AFFILIATE_COMMISSION] for everyone who purchases a copy of [FILM_NAME] through your affiliate link. So feel free to promote that link to your audience in the way that you feel will have the largest impact.

You can track your affiliate commission on your dashboard.

Link: [AFFILIATE_DASHBOARD_LINK]
Email:[EMAIL]
Password: [AFFILIATE_PASSWORD]

If you have questions or need help getting started please email us at: affiliates@lifeismymovie.com.

Thanks for helping us spread the important message found in this film!

Sincerely,
[FILM_NAME] - Affiliate Program

messaging_name: Refer A Family Email Confirmation to Family
messaging_body:
Hi [PARENT_FIRST_NAME]!

[REFERRER_FIRST_NAME] [REFERRER_LAST_NAME] referred you to us as a potential candidate for a Care Community which is a team of 4-8 equipped volunteers who surround families in need, providing them with support through prayer, meals and occasional childcare/mentoring.


Click to watch a short video explaining how Care Communities help serve one type of family - foster families.

We would love to gather and organize a Care Community for you! Over the next few days, would you prayerfully consider if you desire and would benefit from a Care Community surrounding your family?

In the event you already know you’d love the support of a Care Community then please fill out the form below to be connected with a Church Advocate close to you who will look into the volunteer availability in your area.

[BUTTON,URL=[REQUEST_URL],TEXT=Request a Care Community,CENTER=1 /]

We are excited about the opportunity to serve your family!
meta_title: Promise Serves- Loving and Supporting Families

messaging_name: Refer A Family Email Confirmation to Requestor
messaging_body:
Hi [REFERRER_FIRST_NAME],

Thanks for referring the [PARENT_LAST_NAME] family.

We are grateful that you took the time to refer a family to receive support through a care community. By your show of support, it is obvious you are a caring person who wants the best for the [PARENT_LAST_NAME] family. We are humbled and honored that you would seek support from us for someone you care deeply about. Thank you!

Here are some other ways you can get involved as well:

Are you interested in getting involved as a volunteer serving this family or another family who lives close by? Click here to view upcoming awareness events where you can learn how to get plugged in.

Are you interested in launching, leading, or joining a Family Advocacy Ministry at your church? Click here to see when the next clinic will be in your area.

Lastly, be in prayer for the work the Lord is doing through all of those loving and serving families. We appreciate you and your heart to love others.

Thanks again!
meta_title: Promise Serves- Loving and Supporting Families

messaging_subject: Refer a Family For Care Community Support
messaging_body:
How to Refer a Family

Thank you for taking the time to refer a family that is in need of support.

To protect the privacy of the family we ask that you fill out the form below and we'll send an email to the family you are referring. That email will have the video you see on this page as well as an invitation link for them to request a care community from their home church or a church near to them.

While we try to support every family possible please keep in mind that depending on geography and current volunteer strength we may not be able to support this family at this time.

messaging_subject: Refer a Family For Care Community Support
messaging_body:
How to Refer a Family

Thank you for taking the time to refer a family that is in need of support.

To protect the privacy of the family we ask that you fill out the form below and we'll send an email to the family you are referring. That email will have the video you see on this page as well as an invitation link for them to request a care community from their home church or a church near to them.

Please be aware that there is often more families in need than we have care communities. However, by completing this form, if a care community is available in your area we will reach out and see if there is interest. Care communities are typically living within 20 minutes of the family being served, therefore can take some time to pull together. Please email info@c127.org if you have any questions or suggestions. We are honored to serve these amazing families serving in the hard places whenever possible.
meta_title: Promise Serves- Loving and Supporting Families

messaging_name: Refer A Family Email Confirmation to Requestor
messaging_body:
Hi [REFERRER_FIRST_NAME],

We are grateful that you took the time to refer a family to receive support through a care community. By your show of support, it is obvious you are a caring person who wants the best for the family you referred. We are humbled and honored that you would seek support from us for someone you care deeply about. Thank you!

Here are some other ways you can get involved as well:

Are you interested in getting involved as a volunteer serving this family or another family who lives close by? www.c127.org/contact-us to let us know.

Are you interested in launching or leading a Family Advocacy Ministry at your church? Or joining the current advocate team there? Visit www.c127.org/register to see when the next clinic will be in Central Florida.

Might you be interested in stewarding your resources to help sustain this ministry? Prayerfully consider joining Team 127, our group of financial champions who are committed to giving $127 a month so that in three years, we can wrap around 127 families. We’d love to connect and share more about this opportunity in person or visit www.c127.org/donate to join the team!

Lastly, be in prayer for the work the Lord is doing through all of those loving and serving families. We appreciate you and your heart to love others.

We hope to connect in the future,
Betsey and Rechaud
meta_title: Promise Serves- Loving and Supporting Families

messaging_subject: Welcome to Promise Serves - Login Information
messaging_body:
Hi [FIRST_NAME],
We are excited to welcome you to Promise Serves!

Thanks again for talking with us about Promise Serves. We're excited to have you on board!

Your login, first steps and import information is below.

Please let me know if you have any questions, get stuck or encounter any bugs.

Thanks!
[SENDER_FIRST_NAME]

Your Login Information

You can now access the site using the info below.

  • URL: [AFFILIATE_DOMAIN]
  • Email: [EMAIL_ADDRESS]
  • Pass: [PASSWORD]
    Please remember that your password is case sensitive.
[PASSWORD_RESET_INFO]

Or you can use our one time login button to save you the hassle of using copying and pasting the info information above.

[BUTTON,URL=[ONE_TIME_LOGIN_URL],TEXT=One Time Login,CENTER=1 /]

You can update your profile information from the staff edit page here.

Getting Started - Action Steps

  1. Edit your organization information
  2. Click to add / edit your personal profile info
  3. Click to add / edit your organization info
  4. Click to add / edit your staff info
  5. Click to add / edit your Advocates (Click to watch tutorial video)

Staff / Security Access Levels

Staff levels allow for the organization administrators to protect portions of the Promise Serves from people who are lower on the organizational chart. Below is a list of what each access level is able to do inside of the system so that you can setup your staff members appropriately.

All Staff

Ability to edit volunteers, communities, families, and events at church

Staff - Employee

Same access as above + ability to edit info for churches within their affiliate domain.

Staff - Manager

Everything above + ability to edit agencies within their affiliate domain.

Staff - Leadership

Everything above + ability to edit staff, regions, and own affiliate

Staff - Administrator

Has access to everything within their Affiliate domain

Import Data

Let me know once you\'ve had time to think about what data (if any) that you might want to import and I can handle that for you.

If you are interested in importing data then please see the information below on what would be necessary to properly import the data.

The best way to prepare for a clean import is to create separate CSV files for each object:

  • volunteers
  • advocates
  • churches
  • agencies
  • families
  • care communities

The system does its best to interpret the data from the CSV. For example it knows that Yes, Y, X, True, 1, T - all equal "yes". The goal is to be able to throw a lot of different data types at it and get a pretty successful import each time. I\'m supervising each import so it gives me a chance to tweak the code to include something that I haven\'t run across before. So the format of the columns and their values matter less than it might seem. Basically I need be able to interpret each line as it\'s own item in the database. So for example if you have a volunteer then it would be nice to know the following:

  • Name 
    • can be separated into two columns with first and last name 
    • or one full name column
  • Email
  • Phone
  • Address (can be broken out into street address, city, state, zip, or all contained in one column)
  • Care community
    • This can be identified using an internal ID that you guys may use
    • Or the Promise Serves ID (which you won\'t know ahead of time)
    • Or the name of the foster family (this option isn\'t fool proof, but if you have unique names for the families then the system should be able to link them)
    • Also if you want to include the foster families full name together that will help the system too because it\'s less likely that you will have two families with the same first and last names as a combo (e.g. Smith, Jane & Joe)
  • If you keep track of the iterations of a care community then it would be helpful to know which iteration this volunteer is serving / has served on
  • Home Church
    • Again you can use an internal id that you use in your organization
    • Church name
    • or Promise Serves ID (which you probably won\'t know)

That\'s pretty much it. Each object is basically the same we really just need a column that tells us how that object is connected to the others (which church, agency, care community, foster family this person is linked to). If you have any doubt about what field you should include or which associations matter you can just look at the fields and associations for each object on the site.

  • Volunteers: https://[AFFILIATE_SUBDOMAIN].promiseserves.org/volunteer/edit/?i=0
  • Families: https://[AFFILIATE_SUBDOMAIN].promiseserves.org/families/edit/?i=0
  • Communities: https://[AFFILIATE_SUBDOMAIN].promiseserves.org/communities/edit/?i=0
  • Advocates: https://[AFFILIATE_SUBDOMAIN].promiseserves.org/advocates/edit/?i=0
  • Churches: https://[AFFILIATE_SUBDOMAIN].promiseserves.org/churches/edit/?i=0

In most cases you just need a name, but for an advocate you need at least a name, church, and email address to set them up.

Basically don\'t over think it too much. If I can read the spreadsheet and easily figure out which person belongs to which church, care community, family, etc from one row then the system should be able to handle it. I am including some specifics below in case you want to see the possible fields / combinations you can import for each object, but again, don\'t stress about it too much - I\'ll make sure it\'s right and ask any questions if they arise.

Volunteers

  • First Name
  • Last Name
  • Last, First Name
  • Street Address
  • Suite, Unit or Apt
  • City
  • State
  • Zipcode
  • County
  • Country
  • Full Address
  • Email Address
  • Secondary Email Address
  • Mobile Phone
  • Office Phone
  • Home Phone
  • Gender
  • Birthdate
  • Age
  • Home Church Name
  • Care Community Name
  • Volunteer Status
  • Care Community Role
  • Care Community Roles (comma separated)
  • Internal ID
  • Promise Serves Volunteer ID
  • Promise Serves Home Church ID
  • Promise Serves Care Community ID
  • Notes
  • Is Team Leader?
  • Is Family Helper?
  • Is Child Mentor?
  • Is Respite Care?
  • Interest - Advocate
  • Interest - Respite Foster Family
  • Interest - Foster Family
  • Interest - Child Mentor
  • Interest - Team Leader
  • Interest - Family Helper
  • Interest - Serving on a Care Community
  • Interest - Interim Caregiver
  • Interest - Care Portal

Advocates

  • First Name
  • Last Name
  • Last, First Name
  • Full Address
  • Street Address
  • Suite, Unit or Apt
  • City
  • State
  • Zipcode
  • County
  • Country
  • Email Address
  • Secondary Email Address
  • Mobile Phone
  • Office Phone
  • Home Phone
  • Gender
  • Birthdate
  • Age
  • Advocate Status
  • Home Church Name
  • Internal ID
  • Promise Serves Home Church ID
  • Promise Serves Advocate ID

Care Communities

  • Family Name
  • Community Name
  • Community Status
  • Full Address
  • Street Address
  • Suite, Unit or Apt
  • City
  • State
  • Zipcode
  • County
  • Country
  • Food Allergies
  • Food Preferences
  • Preferred Meal Day
  • Iteration
  • Serving Church Name
  • Internal ID
  • Promise Serves Serving Church ID
  • Promise Serves Family ID

Families

  • Family Name
  • Family Status
  • Street Address
  • Suite, Unit or Apt
  • City
  • State
  • Zipcode
  • County
  • Country
  • Home Phone
  • Foster Mom First Name
  • Foster Mom Last Name
  • Foster Dad First Name
  • Foster Dad Last Name
  • Foster Parent First Name
  • Foster Parent Last Name
  • Foster Mom Full Name
  • Foster Dad Full Name
  • Foster Parent Full Name
  • Foster Mom Email Address
  • Foster Dad Email Address
  • Foster Parent Email Address
  • Foster Mom Mobile Phone
  • Foster Dad Mobile Phone
  • Foster Parent Mobile Phone
  • Fostering Status
  • Adoption Status
  • Previously Serves on Care Community?
  • Previously Fostered?
  • Recruited by Church?
  • Recruited by Affiliate
  • Home Church Name
  • Recruiting Church Name
  • Internal ID
  • Promise Serves Home Church ID
  • Promise Serves Recruiting Church ID

You're receiving this email because at one point in time your family has been identified by one of our partner churches as a foster family. Perhaps we have served your family in the past, are currently serving your family, or maybe you are currently waiting to be served with a care community.

Regardless of your current status we're asking for 2 minutes of your time to make sure we have the most accurate information about your family including your current fostering situation.

Thanks in advance for taking the time to update your information on our secure server so that we can best serve your family!

To get started please click the link below which best describes the current status of your family:

We Are Not Fostering

We are no longer fostering and do not plan to open our home again in the future.

We are taking a break from fostering but plan to open our home again in the future.

We are between placements and would like a Care Community in the future.

 

We Are Fostering (or about to)

We are currently fostering and have an active Care Community.

We are currently fostering and but do not want a Care Community at this time.

We are currently fostering and and would like a Care Community to help us.

We are in process of becoming foster parents.

[SALUTATION]

You're receiving this email because at one point in time you were identified by one of our partner churches as an advocate.

Regardless of your current serving status we're asking for 2 minutes of your time to make sure we have the most accurate information about you so that we can help you serve stronger.

Thanks in advance for taking the time to update your information on our secure server so that we can best serve you!

To get started please click the link below which best describes your current serving status:

I am NOT serving

I am no longer serving and have no plans to do so again in the future.

I am taking a break from serving but plan to serve again in the future.

 

I am CURRENTLY serving

I am currently serving as an advocate.

Click to watch a short video explaining how Care Communities help serve families like yours.

We would love to gather and organize a Care Community for you! Over the next few days, would you prayerfully consider if you desire and would benefit from a Care Community surrounding your family?

messaging_name: Families - What is a Care Community
messaging_subject: Families - What is a Care Community
messaging_body:
Request a Care Community

If you would like to be considered for support through a care community please click the button below to get started.

Request a Care Community

Thank you for opening your home to serve vulnerable children!

We would welcome the opportunity to build a care community around your family. Please be aware that there are often more families in need than we available care communities to fill those needs.

Care community volunteers typically live within 20 minutes of the family being served. Because we are relying on volunteers who are close to your home it can take some time for us to coordinate a team, so please be patient as we work to serve your family.

We are honored to serve these amazing families serving in the hard places whenever possible.

If you are requesting a care community on behalf of a foster family then please respect their privacy by using the refer a family page here.

messaging_subject: Refer a Family For Temporary Care Community Support
messaging_body:
How to Refer a Family

Thank you for taking the time to refer a family that is in need of support.

To protect the privacy of the family we ask that you fill out the form below and we'll send an email to the family you are referring. That email will have the video you see on this page as well as an invitation link for them to request a Temporary Care Community (TCC) from their home church or a church near to them.

While we try to support every family possible, please keep in mind that depending on current volunteer capacity and availability we may not be able to support this family at this time.

Thank you for requesting the support of a Temporary Care Community (TCC)!

We welcome the opportunity to build a TCC around your family. Please be aware that there are often more families requesting support than we have available on Temporary Care Communities ready to serve.

We will do our best to match you with church volunteers who can who are ready to serve your family, so please be patient as we work to find this match.

Once you have completed this form, you will be contacted by a Program Coordinator who will briefly go over your needs, the timing, and let you know if we have a potential TCC ready.

If you are requesting a TCC on behalf of a family in need, then please respect their privacy by using the refer a family page here. A sign-up link will then be sent to the family you have referred.
meta_title: Care Community Video and Support Request
meta_desc: A Care Community is a team of 4-8 people who surround families in need, providing them with support through prayer, meals and childcare. Volunteers typically live within 20 minutes of the family being served. Complete the Req

messaging_name: Refer A TCC Family Email Confirmation to Family
messaging_body:
Hi [PARENT_FIRST_NAME]!

[REFERRER_FIRST_NAME] [REFERRER_LAST_NAME] referred you to us as a potential recipient for a Temporary Care Community (TCC) which is a team of 1-2 families or a small group of volunteers from a local church who surround families in need, providing them with support through prayer, coaching, meals and virtual child mentoring for 4-10 weeks.


Click to watch a short video explaining what the Temporary Care Community is and how it works.

We would love to organize a TCC for you! Over the next few days, would you prayerfully consider if you desire and would benefit from a TCC surrounding your family?

In the event you already know you’d love the support of a TCC, then please fill out the form below to be connected with a Program Coordinator close to you who will look into the volunteer availability in your area.

[BUTTON,URL=[REQUEST_URL],TEXT=Request a Temporary Care Community,CENTER=1 /]

We are excited about the opportunity to serve your family!
meta_title: Promise Serves- Loving and Supporting Families

messaging_name: Refer A TCC Family Email Confirmation to Requestor
messaging_body:
Hi [REFERRER_FIRST_NAME],

Thanks for referring the [PARENT_LAST_NAME] family.

We are grateful that you took the time to refer a family to receive support through a Temporary Care Community (TCC). By your show of support, it is obvious you are a caring person who wants the best for the [PARENT_LAST_NAME] family. We are humbled and honored that you would seek support from us for someone you care deeply about. Thank you!

Here are some other ways you can get involved as well:

  • Are you interested in getting involved as a volunteer serving this family or another family who lives close by? Click here to view upcoming awareness events where you can learn how to get plugged in.
  • Are you interested in launching, leading, or joining a Family Advocacy Ministry at your church? Click here to see when the next clinic will be in your area.
  • Lastly, be in prayer for the work the Lord is doing through all of those loving and serving families. We appreciate you and your heart to love others.

Thanks again!
meta_title: Promise Serves- Loving and Supporting Families

messaging_name: Families - What is a Temporary Care Community
messaging_subject: Families - What is a Temporary Care Community
messaging_body:
Request a Temporary Care Community

If you would like to be considered for support through a temporary care community please click the button below to get started.

Request a Temporary Care Community

[SALUTATION]

Welcome to Promise Serves!

We're excited to welcome you to a community of volunteers who are passionate about supporting families and the kids in their home. Thank you for joining the movement!

To access Promise Serves please use the following login information.

Link: [LINK_LOGIN]
Email: [RECIPIENT_EMAIL]

Alternatively you can use the one time login button below to login for the first time.

messaging_name: Families - What is a Temporary Care Community
messaging_subject: Families - What is a Temporary Care Community
messaging_body:
Request a Temporary Care Community

If you would like to be considered for support through a temporary care community please click the button below to get started.

Request a Temporary Care Community

messaging_subject: Refer a Family For Temporary Care Community Support
messaging_body:
How to Refer a Family

Thank you for taking the time to refer a family that is in need of support.

To protect the privacy of the family we ask that you fill out the form below and we'll send an email to the family you are referring. That email will have the video you see on this page as well as an invitation link for them to request a Temporary Care Community (TCC) from their home church or a church near to them.

While we try to support every family possible, please keep in mind that depending on current volunteer capacity and availability we may not be able to support this family at this time.

Thank you for requesting the support of a Temporary Care Community (TCC)!

We welcome the opportunity to build a TCC around your family. Please be aware that there are often more families requesting support than we have available on Temporary Care Communities ready to serve.

We will do our best to match you with church volunteers who can who are ready to serve your family, so please be patient as we work to find this match.

Once you have completed this form, you will be contacted by a Program Coordinator who will briefly go over your needs, the timing, and let you know if we have a potential TCC ready.

If you are requesting a TCC on behalf of a family in need, then please respect their privacy by using the refer a family page here. A sign-up link will then be sent to the family you have referred.
meta_title: Care Community Video and Support Request
meta_desc: A Care Community is a team of 4-8 people who surround families in need, providing them with support through prayer, meals and childcare. Volunteers typically live within 20 minutes of the family being served. Complete the Req

messaging_subject: Help your FAM grow by completing your church MAP
messaging_body: Complete my Church MAP

Dear Amazing Advocate,

As always, thank you for your service to kids! Your work not only helps local children, but also builds the case for a national movement among churches developing Family Advocacy Ministries like yours.

Your input is critical. Please take a moment and use this link to note your progress toward your 2020 Ministry Action Plan for your church.  If you have never filled out a MAP, instructions for newcomers (and for veterans) are in the videos attached.

Click here to complete your MAP.

There may be some goals that are not applicable to your church, and you may leave those either blank or "0".

It you have any questions please feel free to contact us.

Thank you again for you partnership.

[SALUTATION]

Thank you for attending the awareness event and for responding to let us know that you have a desire to help serve vulnerable children.

Someone will be in touch shortly to explain next steps and help guide you to a best match volunteer opportunity.

Thanks again for your time and your interest. We will be in touch soon

[SALUTATION]

Thank you for your RSVP!

You will find the event details below.

We look forward to seeing you at the event!
